bug.author: jpvcaetano
bug.summary: If ReduceLROnPlateau lr scheduler is passed inside a dict it won't work
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
If a ReduceLROnPlateau lr scheduler is passed inside a dict the atribute scheduler['reduce_on_plateau'] will not be set to true. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior: ReduceLROnPlateau lr schedule inside a dictionary and try to train. The error will be something about that there is no metric in step(). <denchmark-h:h4>Simple fix</denchmark-h>
In line 712 of trainer.py replace scheduler['reduce_on_plateau'] = \ isinstance(scheduler, optim.lr_scheduler.ReduceLROnPlateau) by scheduler['reduce_on_plateau'] = \ isinstance(scheduler['scheduler'], optim.lr_scheduler.ReduceLROnPlateau)
